diy_mission: This mission seems to be a large scale alliance mission.

name.label: Name
name.description: Shows the name of the mission in the helper.

id.label: ID
id.description: Displays the ID of the mission in the helper.

type.label: TYP-ID
type.description: Displays the ID of the mission type in the helper.

poi.label: POI
poi.description: Indicates in the helper which POI the operation is at.

live_patients.label: Number of patients
live_patients.description: Shows live how many patients are currently in use.

special.label: Other information
special.description: Displays special information, such as the average minimum number of personnel required.

expansions.label: distributions
expansions.description: Shows what the bet can spread to. (Shows only simple spread)

show_100.label: Show 100% probability
show_100.description: Shows the probability for a vehicle even if it is 100%.

lfrw.label: Show if the Heavy Rescue can process the mission
lfrw.description: Displays a message in the Mission whether it can also be processed with a Heavy Rescue instead of a fire truck.

credits.label: Average earnings
credits.description: Shows the average earnings you get for this assignment.

show_siwa.label: Requirements of security guards
show_siwa.description: Shows the requirements for security guards in the helper as well.

mission_time.label: Creation Time
mission_time.description: Shows the date and time when the mission was created.

requirements.allow_rw_instead_of_lf: Fire trucks or Major Rescue Vehicle
